reports.title: No Rate Limiting on Forgot Password Endpoint
reports.summary: Forgot Password endpoint allows unlimited requests; can be abused to email bomb and enumerate accounts.

reports.title: Weak Password Policy Allows Easily Guessable Credentials
reports.summary: System accepts weak passwords such as 'Test123', '123456', 'password'.
reports.file: Weak Password Policy Allows Easily Guessable Credentials.eml

reports.title: Missing Rate Limiting on Account Deletion Email Trigger
reports.summary: Account deletion email trigger endpoint can be spammed to flood inbox.
reports.file: Bug Report_ Missing Rate Limiting on Account Deletion Email Trigger.eml

reports.title: Failure to Invalidate Session and No Notification After Password Change
reports.summary: Sessions remain active after password change and no notification is sent to the user.
reports.file: Bug Report_ Failure to Invalidate Session After Password Change+ No User Notification After Password Change.eml

reports.title: Concurrent Session Vulnerability: Real-Time Session Synchronization Allows Cross-Session Data Modification
reports.summary: Actions in one session reflect in another without revalidation; increases risk if one session is hijacked.
reports.file: Concurrent Session Vulnerability_Real-Time Session Synchronization Allows Cross-Session Data Modification.eml
